It's Not Just Hardware

DISCOVER THE WORLD OF BEST

Manufacturing and Supply of hardware


Zincline Overseas is one of the most renowned brands in the field of manufacturing and supplying a world-class collection of products like drawer channel, hydraulic hinges, door closers, door magnets door stoppers, door handles, tower bolt, cam bolt and many more. These are manufactured in accordance with widely recognised quality standards, using high quality base material and advanced technology. Moreover, these items are in high demand due to their endurance, accurate dimensions, fine workmanship, long service life, durability and rust resistance. Moreover, they are strictly tested on a variety of criteria such as workmanship, appearance, durability, etc. before final shipment. The company has a well-equipped infrastructure unit, which includes both a large production unit and generous storage facilities. From the very beginning we have focused on quality and therefore we do not compromise on quality and other related aspects. With the help of our large and effective workforce, the company is able to meet the growing demands of our valuable customers. Moreover, we are supported by a strong network of vendors, agents and distributors. This association has helped us in understanding the latest trends and requirements of the market and, in turn, helped us in providing better products and services to our clients.
The advanced facilities enable us to handle large inquiries promptly while maintaining industry standards. As a customer-oriented company, we consider it our duty to meet all their needs, so we provide them with customised solutions.

How We Work

Our future goals

OUR VISION

The main goal of the company is to provide goods and services that meet international standards and satisfy the needs and expectations of our customers in terms of quality, cost, performance, safety and reliability. We want to be the trusted supplier of hardware and fittings. We want our products to satisfy the needs and expectations of our customers for many years, with the quality and appearance of being new, with reliability and at a low cost of ownership.

Our Mission

Our goal is to develop leadership skills and act with zeal, pride and enthusiasm. The company strives to be the preferred supplier that provides exceptional products and services while adding value to our customers. We aim to compete with global competitors and meet the requirements of the Indian residential construction industry in the field of hardware and fittings.

Quality Assurance

Quality management is an essential part of our company's concept. Quality standards are constantly improved through continuous development. We make every effort to provide our customers with high quality items. Before final shipment, all items are thoroughly checked for quality. We also provide tamper-proof packaging to ensure the integrity of our products.

WHY CHOOSE US

Our goal is to provide the highest level of service, the broadest selection of products and the most competitive prices. We create the perfect combination of intelligent technology, functionality and design. It is with this claim that we develop and produce a variety of fittings for all sorts of different functions.

01. Quality

To create a strong customer commitment, we establish and follow the best manufacturing processes and define the best methods for delivering solutions.

02. Integrity

We employ a high level of leadership thinking when providing solutions and product recommendations to our customers. In doing so, we maintain the highest standards of quality, objectivity and integrity, all of which contribute to the success of the project.

03. Customer Focus

Our business concept is to provide services based on the needs of our customers. We also recognise the value of a diverse product portfolio, customised solutions and professional services that contribute to the continued growth of our business prospects.

As a customer-oriented company, we consider it our duty to meet all their needs, so we provide them with customised solutions.
